titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3074) making appropriations for the Departments of Transportation, and Housing and Urban Development, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2008, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-242, by Mr. Welch (VT).
All points of order against consideration of the bill except those arising under clause 9 or 10 or rule XXI. The bill shall be considered for amendment under the five-minute rule.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 89.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 558.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H.Res. 558, the Chair put the question on adoption of ordering the previous question and by voice vote, announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mr. Sessions demanded the yeas and nays and the chair postponed further proceedings on adoption of ordering the previous question until later in the legislative day.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 210 - 179 (Roll no. 690).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/23/2007--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 3074 (Transportation, Housing and Urban Development, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2008).
